environment_variables.name: BUILD_DISPLAY_NAME
environment_variables.description: Display name of the current build

environment_variables.name: JOB_NAME
environment_variables.description: Name of the project of this build

environment_variables.name: EXECUTOR_NUMBER
environment_variables.description: The unique number that identifies the current executor

environment_variables.name: NODE_NAME
environment_variables.description: Name of the node the current build is running on

environment_variables.name: NODE_LABELS
environment_variables.description: Whitespace-separated list of labels assigned to the node

environment_variables.name: WORKSPACE
environment_variables.description: The absolute path of the workspace

environment_variables.name: JENKINS_HOME
environment_variables.description: The absolute path on the master node for Jenkins to store data
